se450.elevator

Interface Elevator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ElevatorImpl

    public interface Elevator
    This interface is the abstraction for all Elevators
    Author:
    Shan Gao

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFloorRequest(int floor, DIRECTION direction)
      This method is the interface for Controller to send a command to the elevator.
      void addRequest(Request request) 
      void addRiderRequest(int floor)
      This method is the interface for Person to send a command to the elevator.

    • Method Detail

      • addFloorRequest

        void addFloorRequest(int floor,
                     DIRECTION direction)
        This method is the interface for Controller to send a command to the elevator. Means someone pressed UP or DOWN button outside the elevator, then controller decided to ask this elevator to respond.
        Parameters:
        floor - - Floor number in int format from 1 to MaxFloor.
        direction - - Emu as in UP, DOWN. Can't be NONE here.

      • addRiderRequest

        void addRiderRequest(int floor)
        This method is the interface for Person to send a command to the elevator. Means someone pressed a floor number button inside the elevator, then elevator will decided whether or not respond.
        Parameters:
        floor - - Floor number in int format from 1 to MaxFloor.

      • addRequest

        void addRequest(Request request)
         throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidParameterException
